public class LoadingScreen
extends greenfoot.World

The loading screen before the simulation is run

Oct 2014
Author:

Method Summary
 void act()
          Act - do whatever LoadingScreen wants to do.
 void started()
          Starts playing the theme of the zombie simulation.
 void stopped()
          Stops playing the theme when the simulation is not running.
 void timer()
          Counts up until a particular integer value, and then switches the screen into another world; that being ZombieWorld.

LoadingScreen

public LoadingScreen(greenfoot.GreenfootSound theme,
                     ModificationStorage store)
Constructor for objects of class LoadingScreen.

Parameters:
theme - the theme music being passed from this world to the next
store - the object carrying the modifiable variables from one world to the next
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Act - do whatever LoadingScreen wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.World

started

public void started()
Starts playing the theme of the zombie simulation.

Overrides:
started in class greenfoot.World

stopped

public void stopped()
Stops playing the theme when the simulation is not running.

Overrides:
stopped in class greenfoot.World

timer

public void timer()
Counts up until a particular integer value, and then switches the screen into another world; that being ZombieWorld. Essentially determines how long the loading screen will last.
